title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 313.2 - Withdrawal of excess contributions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 313.2 - Withdrawal of excess contributions

State Regulations
A member of the New York State Employees' Retirement System
or the New York State Policemen's and Firemen's Retirement System may, by
filing a written request therefor on or after May 1, 1974, withdraw all
accumulated contributions which would otherwise be used to provide additional
annuity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
313.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
